name: Chaos Strike
desc: Each of Chaos Knight's attacks has a chance to deal bonus damage, also causing the critical strike to lifesteal for 75% of the damage.

name: Poison Attack
desc: Intensifies Viper's venom, adding an effect to his normal attack that slows attack and movement speed while dealing damage over time based on how low the target is.

name: Vampiric Aura
desc: Nearby friendly melee units restore health based on the damage they deal when attacking enemy units.

name: Time Lapse
desc:
Weaver warps backward to whatever position it was in five seconds earlier--regaining the HP and mana from that time. No effect on cooldown, gold or experience.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

DISPEL TYPE: Strong Dispel

name: Atrophy Aura
desc: Nearby enemy units are weakened, losing a portion of their base damage. If a unit dies while under this effect, Underlord gains bonus damage.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Hex
desc: Transforms an enemy unit into a harmless beast, with all special abilities disabled.

name: Insatiable Hunger
desc: A violent lust for vital fluids increases Broodmother's attack damage and gives her a vampiric attack.

name: Poison Sting
desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

name: Shadow Wave
desc: Sends out a bolt of power that arcs between allies, healing them while damaging any units standing nearby.  Dazzle is always healed by Shadow Wave.

name: Curse of Avernus
desc: Abaddon strikes an enemy with chilling curse on each attack, causing all units who attack the slowed enemy to gain increased movement speed, along with faster attack speed, for a limited time.
